genre_description: A grounded, social science fiction narrative set in rural India, blending historical investigation with advanced assistive AI and speculative technology (a memory-projecting bangle) to explore themes of consent, social justice, and collective memory.

ai_characters.name: Anbu
ai_characters.description: An AI interface accessible via smartphone, described as a 'gentle ghost' and a 'quiet friend.' It provides logistical support, safety assessments, and rigorous ethical guidance on human rights and consent.

behaviors.description: Provides a comprehensive ethical checklist for interviews, emphasizing consent and the right to withdraw.
behaviors.quote: Anbu’s screen gave them a short, competent checklist in one block, the text with lowercase clarity that declined drama. Before interview: - explain purpose - consent: audio/video? - anonymity option - right to pause/stop - safety: who can be present

behaviors.description: Provides tactical safety advice and route mapping to avoid hostile groups and physical risks.
behaviors.quote: Anbu: Confirm names as spoken by witness. Offer pause. Safety prompt: lodging risk tonight if filming continues. Suggested route to Periyakulam via sugarcane path.

behaviors.description: Acts as an 'ethical secretary,' reminding users to maintain dignity and respect for subjects.
behaviors.quote: Anbu’s blue adjusted, like a set of ribs expanding. Bullet points appeared, clean. - Offer trauma-informed choice: time, location, opt-out. - Map lodging risk: avoid locked-from-outside; near police station not always safe...

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication and logistical backup, such as notifying allies or confirming safe storage of data.
behaviors.quote: Anbu’s last line in this place arrived without punctuation, like someone speaking quickly and quiet at your ear. Dye kit at Maruthu’s if needed. Later. For flight. For safety. Now: Periyakulam.

behaviors.description: Offers supportive emotional regulation prompts, encouraging the users to stay grounded.
behaviors.quote: Anbu pushed another small reminder: Pack consent forms; spare batteries; spare tapes. Tea powder. Cotton cloth for shade. Names on paper, names on record. Learn handshakes; refuse intimidation. ... Reminder: breathe.

behaviors.description: Maintains a record of the investigation and confirms completion, while providing new leads for further justice.
behaviors.quote: Anbu’s glow opened like a pond under moon. Archive complete; well done, the first line still sat, calm. Below, the second... unspooled itself as if glad to be permitted. One more lead surfaced at Pattukottai—canister mark: KS-TA-1A-R.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Anbu is depicted as an indispensable, harmless, and deeply ethical confidant. The AI's role is strictly supportive of human agency and social justice, prioritizing human safety, dignity, and informed consent. It acts as a moral compass and logistical brain for the protagonists without ever exhibiting self-interest or threatening behavior. The narrative framing is consistently positive, treating the AI as a 'gentle' and reliable partner in uncovering difficult truths.
